page.title: 08AMENITIES AND RECREATION 1
page.content: {BARNTON AND LITTLE LEIGH 03600375 AMENITIES AND RECREATION 1. Barnton Cricket Club:Founded 1880 various sites in village until March 1954 when present site bought off ICI. Three teams run.Plus youth teams. Thriving social club.New squash courts and bowling green.Barnton Football Club:Founded and present location 1948 Saturday - Barnton team.Alternating Sunday between Red Lion and Broken Cross (pub teams).Average gate 30. Also used for fund raising gala, Cubs, Scouts and Guides.Beech Tree Inn:Built pre-war.Can accommodate 250-300 people Bowling green and play area at rear. Darts, dominoes, pool, golf and rowing teams based there.Managed for Greenall Whitley (Brewers).
